targets.query: SELECT mean("slow_queries") FROM "mysql_mysql" WHERE ("server" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s)*8 FROM "mysql_mysql" WHERE ("server" = '/^$Server$/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s)*8 FROM "mysql_mysql" WHERE ("server" = '/^$Server$/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
